Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 103 Typist, Lower Division Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Jul 18, 2025, 17:00 IST
 Meghalaya Public Service Commission
 103 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Jul-2025 |  Meghalaya |  Salary : 25,000 to 81,100




FOLLOW

The Meghalaya Public Service Commission (Meghalaya PSC) has officially released the notification to fill up the 103 Typist, Lower Division Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th and 12th pass can apply for the Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for the Jobs in Meghalaya.

Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Typist	32	10th pass
Lower Division Assistant	71	12th

Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 32 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.

Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on

Written Exam.
Interview.

Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee is

For all other candidates: Rs. 320/-.
For SC/ST candidates: Rs. 160/-.
For PWD candidates: NIL.

Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 81,100/- per month.
How to Apply for the Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Meghalaya PSC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	15-07-2025
Closing date	16-08-2025

Official Notification for typist	Click Here
